PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-06572024-06-10ECCC
ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Metal and Diamond Mining Effluent Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the METAL AND DIAMOND MINING EFFLUENT REGULATIONS in order to list two water bodies and one geographic area encompassing six water bodies to Schedule 2, designating them as tailings impoundment areas and authorize their destruction for the purpose of depositing mine waste disposal.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0124 Publication Date: 2024-06-19
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the METAL AND DIAMOND MINING EFFLUENT REGULATIONS in order to list two water bodies and one geographic area encompassing six water bodies to Schedule 2, designating them as tailings impoundment areas and authorize their destruction for the purpose of depositing mine waste disposal.
